name: Bowling is a Fun Game
description:
TLDR: PLEASE PLAY WITH A CONTROLLER!! IT'S VERY DIFFICULT TO PLAY WITH MOUSE AND KEYBOARD.

This is a rough, unfinished version of a horror bowling game made a few years ago by me and several friends while studying game design at Aalto University. The only time this has been shown was at my school's end of year exhibition and on my YouTube channel. I have no plans to finish it, but a few people have asked to play so I'm releasing it.

Remember, this is an unpolished prototype, not a full game. You may encounter bugs or be totally unable to run it. I haven't tested this on anything other than my own Windows laptop. There is, unfortunately, no OSX version. The game is best played with a controller, because the mouse input is inverted to accommodate the controller. If you do play with mouse/keyboard, the left mouse click is your action button. To quit the game, use alt-F4.

The idea came when a lecturer said that new, interesting games could be created by mixing different genres. "But," he said, "not all genres mix well. Like horror and sports." He may have been correct.

CREDITS:

3D art and animation - Mikael Immonen

Programming - Nestor Köhler
